SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
REBATE MANAGEMENT
View the Rebates and Incentives Attainment Snapshot on Accounts

Ensure that account managers and channel partners are equipped with key rebate and incentive insights so that they can create mutually beneficial deals and maximize earnings. The Program Rebate Types panel on an account displays the account's rebate types and shows progress against those rebates based on the current date.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in: Enterprise, Unlimited, and Developer Editions that have Rebate Management enabled.
View the projected rebate amount for the current year. This amount is the total of all approved or in-progress rebates calculated thus far for the current calendar year.
Click the Applied tab to see the rebate types for rebate programs in which the account is enrolled as a member. The projected rebate amount for each rebate type is for the period based on the current date. For example, when looking at this card in January, you see that the projected rebate amount for the Radius product rebate incentive in the first fiscal quarter is over $20,000.
Click the amount for a rebate type to drill into its projection basis and see the payout period considered, the completed volume or value attainments, and the calculation measure.
See an account's progress by viewing the number of benefit tiers achieved, the current tier, and the volume or value the account is short from attaining the next tier. Hover over the current or the next tier in the benefits progress bar to see the applied benefit and qualifying value for the benefit tier.
Add the Program Rebate Types Panel to Accounts
Add the Program Rebate Types Panel Lightning component to an account record page so that your account managers can view the applicable rebate types for an account. They can also view the rebates and incentives attainment for an account.
